name: Indexing Service
description: Salsify microservice that enables fast and extensible indexing, percolation, and search across Salsify. Clients emit aggregate change events which the service persists to Elasticsearch and makes available via an API abstracted from the underlying schema. Handles products, digital assets, and other entities.

name: CurrentAggregateVersion
description: Database table in the indexing-service that tracks the current version and epoch of aggregates. Uses epochs as a lazy migration process for versioning records, enabling Elasticsearch's optimistic concurrency control.
